snippet.title: Men in Black 3 Launch Trailer - iPhone, iPad & Android Official Game
snippet.description:
The official game of 2012's exciting action blockbuster, Men in Black 3 is NOW available for FREE on iPhone, iPad & Android.

Agent, humanity is in danger! The vile Radiant has arrived on Earth and he must be stopped now.
For the first time ever, you will be in charge of the MIB agency, but don't worry, Agent O, Agent K and Frank will help you to run the agency and fight against this new threat to mankind.
Good luck.

Official site: http://www.gameloft.com
Friend us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Gameloft
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Gameloft
Visit our blog: http://blog.gameloft.com
